pages.text: There really isn’t much to say here, other than what’s already apparent. The overlay can help you $(l)know exactly what block or entity you’re looking at$(reset) and will be especially helpful for recognizing items you’re not familiar with.

$(l)Sneaking can reveal some additional information$(reset) about certain blocks (for example it can show you the inventory of a tile entity). The overlay also shows you $(l)harvestability information$(reset), so what tool you’re supposed to use to break a certain block and if the tool you’re currently holding is able to break it.
